changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATUM_LOOKUP', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATUM_LOOKUP ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID() PRIMARY KEY, DATUM NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(MAX) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATUM_LOOKUP', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATUM_LOOKUP
